name: Spinach-Mushroom Scrambled Eggs
instruction: Sauté mushrooms in a pan until golden. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Add beaten eggs and cook until set. Top with cheese and serve.

name: Egg & Chorizo Wraps
instruction: Cook chorizo in a pan until browned. Add beaten eggs and scramble until fully cooked. Place mixture in tortillas and serve.

name: Toad in a Hole
instruction: Preheat oven to 220°C. Arrange sausages in a baking dish. Mix milk, eggs, and flour to form a batter. Pour over sausages and bake until puffed and golden.

name: Blueberry Muffin French Toast
instruction: Slice muffins in half. Dip in a mixture of creamer and cinnamon. Cook on a griddle until golden brown on both sides.

name: Avocado Toast
instruction: Mash avocado with salt and pepper. Spread on toasted bread slices. Serve immediately.

name: Green Smoothie
instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Pour into a glass and serve.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Breakfast Pops
instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze overnight.
